<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The FDRTraceWriter allows us to hand-craft an XRay Flight Data Recorder</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="comment">/// (FDR) mode log file. This is used primarily for testing, generating</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="comment">/// sequences of FDR records that can be read/processed. It can also be used to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="comment">/// generate various kinds of execution traces without using the XRay runtime.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Note that this writer does not do any validation, but uses the types of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="comment">/// records defined in the FDRRecords.h file.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/xray/fdrtracewriter"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/xray/fdrtracewriter/#ac7333c2977ef0c36d662ef9cff756703">FDRTraceWriter</a> : </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/xray/recordvisitor">RecordVisitor</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
